1391530.name: Mud and Blood
1391530.description:
The cult classic flash game is back with its own new engine, an evolved AI and a ton of new features.

Key Features

  • Key Features of Mud and Blood

    Unforgiving Tactical Gameplay

    • Command your squad through brutal, real-time battles where every decision matters. No hand-holding, no second chances—just pure tactical chaos.

    Procedural Battlefields

    • Each battlefield is procedurally generated, ensuring no two encounters are ever the same. Adapt to unpredictable terrain and shifting combat conditions.

    Unrelenting Realism

    • Experience the brutal realities of modern war, where small mistakes lead to big consequences. Soldiers panic, weapons jam, and death is swift.

    Trench Mode

    • Engage in large-scale trench warfare with simplified controls but heightened intensity. Build defenses, lead assaults, and outmaneuver your foes in this strategic mode.

    Dynamic Campaign

    • Start at D-Day and lead your squad across Europe, facing an increasingly skilled enemy as you progress. Each mission builds on your choices and tactics.

    Deck-Building Mechanics

    • Collect and deploy unique unit cards, from French Resistance fighters to Airborne Troops, adding depth and variety to your strategy.

    Historical Accuracy Meets Chaos

    • From realistic vehicle call signs to historically inspired enemy tactics, immerse yourself in an authentic yet chaotic World War II experience.

    Buildable Defenses

    • Fortify your position with trenches, bunkers, pillboxes, and more. Adapt your defenses to counter an ever-changing battlefield.

    Rewarding Progression

    • Earn campaign stars and ribbons to mark your achievements. Watch your soldiers grow from green recruits to hardened veterans—if they survive.

    A Community-Driven Legacy

    • Built over 16 years with community input, Mud and Blood is a passion project designed to challenge, frustrate, and reward like no other.

     Brutal AI Opponents

    • Face an enemy AI designed to outmaneuver and outgun you. German forces, from Fallschirmjägers to SS troops, will exploit every weakness in your strategy.

    Festive Events and Surprises

    • Seasonal events like the Xmas special bring unexpected twists and rewards to the battlefield.

    No Mercy, Just Mud and Blood

    • This is not a game for the faint of heart. It’s raw, unfair, and brutally honest—just like war itself.

    Step forward, Commander, and see if you have what it takes to endure the Mud and Blood.

About

Mud and Blood was, for the most part, created in an unlikely place: an outpost somewhere between Kandahar and Panjway, Afghanistan. Initially developed as a flash game by urb in between missions on a beat-up laptop, it became a way to decompress from the chaos. Ironically, a game about brutal, unforgiving war was itself forged in the heart of a conflict. What began as a personal project has since evolved into a cult classic, beloved by a fiercely loyal community for over 16 years.

At its core, Mud and Blood embraces a unique philosophy: challenge, not comfort. The gameplay is punishingly difficult, but it respects your tactical sense and cognitive ability. It doesn’t drip-feed you success to keep you engaged. Every decision matters, every mistake is costly, and every victory is hard-earned. This is a game that trusts its players to make tough calls on the fly, think critically, and persevere through chaos and loss.

In Mud and Blood, war is not heroic. It’s messy, unpredictable, and brutal. Yet amidst the carnage, there’s a raw beauty in the stories that emerge—a narrative forged by the player, much like the Dwarf Fortress of combat. Your experience becomes your own war story: a tale of triumph against an unrelenting enemy and the quiet pride of knowing you gave it everything you had.

Crafted with love, a touch of PTSD, and a deep respect for its community, Mud and Blood is a humble tribute to those who dare to face the impossible.
